title: Energy Ministry introduce hotlines for fuel quality complaints
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Power and Energy has issued two hotline numbers for consumers to voice their concerns regarding fuel quality.
Accordingly, consumers have been advised to contact the CPC on 0115234234 or 0115455130 regarding the quality of fuel.
